channel.title: Need a FULLY Working Special Attack Tutorial
channel.description:
Ok, I want a fully working special attack tutorial.
Which Includes 1) The Right Graphics 2) Damage, not just an emote. 3) For The DDS, I want it to hit 2 times. 4) I just want a single emote on the emote bar, which says Specials.
I hope you can help.
================================= x0 0wn.
